languages.text: {n}А затем все заканчивается. Вид-скрины очищаются, кибергоргулья разжимает челюсти, тишина на мостике сменяется обычной мешаниной звуков. Рука болит нестерпимо, но зато зрение ясно как никогда — более никакого марева, никаких безумных пятен света.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}А затем все заканчивается. Вид-скрины очищаются, кибер-горгулья разжимает челюсти, тишина на мостике сменяется обычной мешаниной звуков. Рука болит нестерпимо, но зато зрение ясно, как никогда — более никакого марева, никаких безумных пятен света.{/n}

languages.text: {n}And then everything stops. The vid-screens go blank, the cybergargoyle releases its jaws, the silence on the bridge gives way to the everyday cacophony of noises. Your hand hurts terribly, but at least your vision has cleared — no more haze and no mad blots of light.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}А затем все заканчивается. Вид-скрины очищаются, кибергоргулья разжимает челюсти, тишина на мостике сменяется обычной мешаниной звуков. Рука болит нестерпимо, но зато зрение ясно как никогда — более никакого марева, никаких безумных пятен света.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}And then everything stops. The vid-screens go blank, the cybergargoyle releases its jaws, the silence on the bridge gives way to the everyday mishmash of noises. Your hand hurts terribly, but at least your vision has cleared — no more haze and no mad blots of light.{/n}

{n}And then everything stops. The vid-screens go blank, the cybergargoyle releases its jaws, the silence on the bridge gives way to the everyday mishmash of noises. Your hand hurts terribly, but at least your vision has cleared — no more haze and no mad blots of light.{/n}

{n}And then everything stops. The vid-screens go blank, the cybergargoyle releases its jaws, the silence on the bridge gives way to the everyday cacophony of noises. Your hand hurts terribly, but at least your vision has cleared — no more haze and no mad blots of light.{/n}

{n}And then everything stops. The vid-screens go blank, the cybergargoyle releases its jaws, the silence on the bridge gives way to the everyday cacophony of noises. Your hand hurts terribly, but at least your vision has cleared — no more haze and no mad blots of light.{/n}

{n}And then everything stops. The vid-screens go blank, the cybergargoyle releases its jaws, the silence on the bridge gives way to the everyday cacophony of noises. Your hand hurts terribly, but at least your vision has cleared — no more haze and no mad blots of light.{/n}

languages.text: {n}そして全てが止まった。スクリーンは真っ白になり、サイバーガーゴイルは口を放し、ブリッジの上の静寂は日常の不快なノイズへと変わった。手はひどく痛むが、少なくとも視界ははっきりしている。ぼやけたり光が滲むこともない。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}And then everything stops. The vid-screens go blank, the cybergargoyle releases its jaws, the silence on the bridge gives way to the everyday cacophony of noises. Your hand hurts terribly, but at least your vision has cleared — no more haze and no mad blots of light.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}そして全てが止まった。スクリーンは真っ白になり、サイバーガーゴイルは口を放し、ブリッジの上の静寂は日常の不快なノイズへと変わった。手はひどく痛むが、少なくとも視界ははっきりしている。ぼやけたり光が滲むこともない。{/n}

languages.text: {n}随后，一切都停止了。视讯屏幕一片空白，电子滴水嘴兽松开了它的下巴，舰桥上的寂静被日常的嘈杂声所取代。你的手疼得厉害，但至少你的视力已经清晰了，不再有阴霾，也不再有疯狂晃动的光点。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}And then everything stops. The vid-screens go blank, the cybergargoyle releases its jaws, the silence on the bridge gives way to the everyday cacophony of noises. Your hand hurts terribly, but at least your vision has cleared — no more haze and no mad blots of light.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}随后，一切都停止了。视讯屏幕一片空白，电子滴水嘴兽松开了它的下巴，舰桥上的寂静被日常的嘈杂声所取代。你的手疼得厉害，但至少你的视力已经清晰了，不再有阴霾，也不再有疯狂晃动的光点。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Und dann hört alles auf. Die Vid-Bildschirm erlöschen, der Cybergargoyle löst seinen Kiefer, das Schweigen auf der Brücke weicht der alltäglichen Kakophonie von Geräuschen. Deine Hand schmerzt fürchterlich, doch zumindest siehst du wieder normal — kein Nebel mehr, keine verrückten Lichtflecken.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}And then everything stops. The vid-screens go blank, the cybergargoyle releases its jaws, the silence on the bridge gives way to the everyday cacophony of noises. Your hand hurts terribly, but at least your vision has cleared — no more haze and no mad blots of light.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Und dann hört alles auf. Die Vid-Bildschirm erlöschen, der Cybergargoyle löst seinen Kiefer, das Schweigen auf der Brücke weicht der alltäglichen Kakophonie von Geräuschen. Deine Hand schmerzt fürchterlich, doch zumindest siehst du wieder normal — kein Nebel mehr, keine verrückten Lichtflecken.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Soudain, tout s'arrête. Les écrans s'éteignent, la cybergargouille relâche son emprise, le silence de la passerelle fait place à son habituelle cacophonie. Votre main vous fait souffrir terriblement, mais votre vision s'est éclaircie ; vous ne voyez plus de brume ni de taches de lumière.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}And then everything stops. The vid-screens go blank, the cybergargoyle releases its jaws, the silence on the bridge gives way to the everyday cacophony of noises. Your hand hurts terribly, but at least your vision has cleared — no more haze and no mad blots of light.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Soudain, tout s'arrête. Les écrans s'éteignent, la cybergargouille relâche son emprise, le silence de la passerelle fait place à son habituelle cacophonie. Votre main vous fait souffrir terriblement, mais votre vision s'est éclaircie ; vous ne voyez plus de brume ni de taches de lumière.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Y entonces todo se detiene. Las videopantallas se apagan, la cibergárgola abre sus mandíbulas, el silencio que reinaba en el puente da paso a la habitual cacofonía de sonidos. Te duele terriblemente la mano, pero al menos se te ha despejado la cabeza; ya no tienes la vista nublada ni ves chiribitas de colores.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}And then everything stops. The vid-screens go blank, the cybergargoyle releases its jaws, the silence on the bridge gives way to the everyday cacophony of noises. Your hand hurts terribly, but at least your vision has cleared — no more haze and no mad blots of light.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Y entonces todo se detiene. Las videopantallas se apagan, la cibergárgola abre sus mandíbulas, el silencio que reinaba en el puente da paso a la habitual cacofonía de sonidos. Te duele terriblemente la mano, pero al menos se te ha despejado la cabeza; ya no tienes la vista nublada ni ves chiribitas de colores.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Bir anda her şey duruyor. Video ekranları bomboş kalıyor, sibergargoyl ağzını açıyor ve köprüdeki sessizlik, yerini günlük kakofoniye bırakıyor. Elinin acısı anlatılmaz yaşanır ancak en azından artık net görebiliyorsun. Herhangi bir pus ya da delice ışık kümesi yok.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}And then everything stops. The vid-screens go blank, the cybergargoyle releases its jaws, the silence on the bridge gives way to the everyday cacophony of noises. Your hand hurts terribly, but at least your vision has cleared — no more haze and no mad blots of light.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Bir anda her şey duruyor. Video ekranlar bomboş kalıyor, sibergargoyl ağzını açıyor ve köprüdeki sessizlik, yerini günlük kakofonisine bırakıyor. Elinin acısı anlatılmaz yaşanır ancak en azından artık net görebiliyorsun. Herhangi bir pus ya da delice ışık kümesi yok.{/n}
